text: My mother told me Homer Ditto was not my father. Nope. Mom had had a fling with some other guy who was my dad. Some dude who didn't stick around too long who Mom was happy to get rid of. She chose Homer, and Homer chose me, so he lent me his name even though I didn't have his blood.
author: Beth Ditto

text: If my Dad doesn't like you, you will know. My Mom is just too innocent to ever lie. She doesn't even cuss.
author: Channing Tatum

text: I have a chaperone everywhere I go - my mom.
author: Shawn Johnson

text: Something my mom taught me when I was little is that everything happens for a reason.
author: Shawn Johnson

text: There is nothing I love more than my role as a mom.
author: Jennifer Hudson
